title: Machine Learning-Based Education on High-Strength High-Toughness Aluminum Alloy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Education enabling pre-service teachers to understand material design processes through industrial application cases and acquire skills in utilizing machine learning tools

learning_goals: Explain core principles of high-strength high-toughness aluminum alloy design (strength-toughness trade-off, role of alloying elements)
Predict virtual alloy compositions using machine learning-based design systems and compare them with experimental data
Propose optimal alloy combinations based on performance metrics provided in reference cases (UTS 700–750 MPa, δ 8–10%, K<inf>IC</inf> 33–35 MPa·m1/2)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
